text: Außernzell is a municipality in the district of Deggendorf in Bavaria in Germany. It is part of the municipal union of Schöllnach. ==Geography== The village is in the Donau-Wald region and it is in the valley of the Kleinen Ohe river, which empties into the Danube in the Bavarian Forest. ==References== Category:Deggendorf (district)
title: Außernzell
